org.openimaj.experiment.evaluation.cluster.analyser

Class DecisionAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.experiment.evaluation.cluster.analyser.DecisionAnalysis
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnalysisResult

    public class DecisionAnalysis
extends Object
implements AnalysisResult
    Counting the number of true positives, true negatives, flase postitives and false negatives one can produce various cluster quality metrics including the fscore and randindex
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
